attributes.action: Change the current vaccine roll out so frontline staff are vaccinated
attributes.additional_details:
The why is obvious teachers are worried to teach, hospital staff, funeral professionals are in danger on a daily basis of catching covid, care workers going into the elderly on a daily basis worry about being non symptomatic and passing it on.
If the vaccine was rolled out to front line staff first so we can keep the country moving, children in school while protecting our elderly population by vaccinating the people that are caring, teaching and working through this pandemic.
attributes.background:
The current vaccination programme is not helping the country or the economy.
While we understand the need to protect the elderly population, how do we expect schools to stay open, Hospitals to keep running at full capacity if the vaccine isn’t given to front line workers first.
